website_summaries.verdict: Sennheiser's HD 1 wireless earphones combine a luxurious leather design with some serious bass depth and sculpted highs.
pros: Powerful audio performance with deep bass and bright highs
Classy leather design with red stitching details
cons: Sculpted sound signature not for those seeking accurate, flat response
Could use more eartip fit options

customer_reviews.title: ... was looking for a wireless ieb with bass and awesome soundstage with clarity and try many wireless headphones for ...
customer_reviews.text: After I was looking for a wireless ieb with bass and awesome soundstage with clarity and try many wireless headphones for leisure the Sennheiser HD1 are the one that satisfied my needs. After eqing with specific player app the high end ( those tent to be too bright and cause ear fatigue, ) I found that I can have my punchy bass and sub bass too. I use this and the Sony MDRXB70 for Funk, House music ( where bass frequencies are needed.) urge u all to custom your sound with specific players Apps- Onkyo HF or Colatplayer are the bomb! Alexia.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these if you like good sound
customer_reviews.text: WhenI first unpacked them they seemed ok, the neck band a bit bulky but not to bad. When I put them on i noticed that the wires are long and consequently stick out around your head. But the sound was something else, very shrill treble and no bass at all. I downloaded their app as advised by reviews and tried it out. It worked for some tracks on my ITunes library but not others, all in all I got very frustrated. They are being returned, I will buy a bose pair instead.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebell

customer_reviews.title: I never write reviews but these earphones are incredible! ...
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but these earphones are incredible! I bought the Bose SoundSport Wireless too and I think the sound quality is light years ahead on these. I would describe the sound signature as balanced but customised via Spotify, I get the bass rich warm profile I prefer. A shame that these aren't available in a sports version as I would then have no need for my Bose pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ssd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but weird-looking
customer_reviews.text: If you can live with how weird these look then they are a great choice. Maybe make sure you can tweak the sound of your source as I found them a bit muddy and bass-heavy when feeding them with a flat equaliser. After dialling back the bass frequenices a little they sound fantastic. Also worth noting that I haven't had a single connection problem while listening. On my phone (Samsung S7 Edge) I had to use the NFC feature to pair them, as the standard bluetooth pairing refused to work, but other than that they've been absolutely solid.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a 2 noise cancelling set I got for Christmas. Fortunately it didn’t work and it was returned to the shop and I got this set from Amazon at really good price. I use it round the house and garden so noise cancelling was not my main requirement. I am not fearful of the earpieces dropping out and getting lost as everything is joined together. Really happy with it and looking forward to the summer in the garden with my Audible books.
customer_reviews.author: VM J

customer_reviews.title: A pleasant listening experience.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of earphone. Bought theses to wear outside so I didn’t have a trailing lead. They are comfortable and are good at isolating outside noise. As with all head/ear phones and speakers the sound quality is an individual thing. As I’m fast reaching my 70th birthday I have lost some of the top end of my hearing. These however sounded smooth, nice solid bass and a comfortable top end that together offered a pleasant listening experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robert J. Price

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear audio
customer_reviews.text: For some reason upon purchase the sound isn't great but it improves immensely after a couple of weeks. I thought the product was damaged. Sennheiser customer service explained that the product is built like this. There is no software app to run with the earphones, the wire is rather thin but not an issue and the brace is comfortable around the neck. Overall probably the best set of earphones I've ever purchased and the sound quality is way more superior than the B&O earphones I have.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Skype or Windows 8 laptop
customer_reviews.text: A good product but really doesn’t do what it says on the tin. If you are buying this to play music from your phone - works great but there are plenty of better, smaller & cheaper models out there. If you are spending extra for a wireless headset that can connect to 10 devices and use it so you can take calls from your mobile, laptop via Skype without having to fiddle about with devices - forget it. It will not work with Skype, or Windows 8. It works then disconnects. Returned for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Fallis

customer_reviews.title: Sound and low noice and shallbe easy to activate.
customer_reviews.text: > Fulfills most of my expectations, it is very nice to have the plugs in a "neck-hanger" > However, it is annoying to have to activate the very small dot used to answer phonecalls, should be possible by e.g. thumb-activation-buttom outside the left side of the neck-hanger. >When speaking in phone, using both ear plugs, the sound of my own voice makes disturbing sound (i.e. like "roaming") in my ears. > Could use noice reduction on the microphone when in windy or external noicy sourroundings.
customer_reviews.author: René Neckelmann

customer_reviews.title: Decent for what I wanted it to be
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the comfort is a bit annoying, the horseshoe shaped base sometimes just moves left and right a bit too much which can then drag on your earbuds, which in turn also has the wired flare outwards. The mic quality is absolutely horrendous from what I hear from others. On the positive side though, great battery life, great sound quality, which is what I bought it for. hence my 4 stars It's good
customer_reviews.author: Niels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cracking sound and lots of comfort. Ive had a few Bluetooth headsets but these are by far the best
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J Langstead

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and very comfortable but falls short a bit on battery
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are pretty good, sound quality is great, the mic is clear on the other end when talking calls and they are comfortable to wear. Only problem with these earphones is that the battery can be quite temperamental, don't think I've never gotten the 10hour playback as advertised before they went flat, even when fully charged. But if you're good at keeping your devices charged you shouldn't really have a problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy - this is discontinued old stock with no compatible Sennheiser app
customer_reviews.text: I wanted in ears with a cable for outside workouts and these came recommended. Unfortunately, they sound terrible through an iphone 11 and the app that corrects this was discontinued in 2018 and the updated version doesn't support them. I understand discounting old stock but not non functioning stock. I have started the refund process
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Best and most robust neckband headset I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I finally twigged you get what you pay for with these neck band headsets. Solid, good quality, good battery life and a lot more robust than Anker, Samsung and Sony competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Biker

customer_reviews.title: great product, replaced the original Xmas present which was ...
customer_reviews.text: great product, replaced the original Xmas present which was by Apple, as those seemed to be the safer option. Sound quality is great, the transport of them is slightly unpractical as in a rather large box... but at least they are safe
customer_reviews.author: KirHin

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but poor battery and bulky
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent, as you'd expect from Sennheiser, and they are very comfortable. They are a little bulkier than expected and there is some distortion when using them as a headset, the biggest disappointment though is the battery life, it doesn't even come close to 10 hours and should be far better for the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Skeates

customer_reviews.title: best by far!!
customer_reviews.text: these are better than any of my headphones and especially in summer...no brainer...brilliant sound..brilliant 10hr battery life...really fast charging. done. 10/10. well done sennheiser!! wipe the floor with my xm3!!!.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wanted these for Calls & WhatsApp ... Bit fiddly to get audio/video calls working on my Android phone but the problem was totally on the phone - this headset worked just fine! The battery stamina is great too.. All in all highly recommended...#
customer_reviews.author: Alastair S.

customer_reviews.title: Music keeps dropping out think Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Hi had these couple of months now it’s my 2nd pair 1st pair I had from being released and loved them very much this pair tho the Bluetooth seems to keeps dropping out and very annoying so have to go back for replacement but think sound amazing when you fit comply ear buds makes massive difference.
customer_reviews.author: bradley martin

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Product
customer_reviews.text: This device will lose connectivity to your TV / Repeater etc by simply having your hand covering the left side (receiver)... Utter garbage from such a good brand..
customer_reviews.author: Lord Ransom

customer_reviews.title: Sound - very terrible. Quality build - very comfortable and high.
customer_reviews.text: Bass and middle is great. High frequency is very very very terrible. I'm so disappointed because in my mind Sennheiser is professional company. I don't know why they still produce somet like this. I will buy again HD 280 Pro and I will check if this one is still this same sound quality. I'm returning this headband. They are very comfortable and ideal if you don't focus in sound.
customer_reviews.author: iwoodi

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and value!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good pair of wireless earphones and had looked at the Sony wm1003 but decided on these as i didn't want to loose one of the buds and end up with useless pair of earphones! Excellent sound quality and well made and fit nicely into the ears with the usual assortment of sizes to fit your ear. Overall really impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I cannot say enough good things about these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sounds is as expected clear, mids with a nice warm punchy bass and LOTS of room, they for me are super comfortable , the NFC function is super convenient and so far they feel as solid as i expect from Sennheiser
customer_reviews.author: Technomouseuk

customer_reviews.title: Damn fine sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones. Light around the neck, good functions on the neck band , once you learn the buttons. As the earphones burn in the sound definitely improves. Also, grab some Comply tips, makes a massive difference to bass response, and seal in the ear. Why only 4 stars? Well only loved them once I used comply ear tips :)
customer_reviews.author: c s.

customer_reviews.title: Almost good
customer_reviews.text: Someone mentioned before :"the treble is too much to the point of bothering your ear" And have to agree 100%,treble doesn't sound natural and very often.... way too far at the front
customer_reviews.author: P Sorbjan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound, great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I was a little dubious of the sound quality from Bluetooth headphones but these are amazing. No problem pairing them to my devices. If you’re considering using them with an Apple computer download the app that can force the Bluetooth on the machine to run APTX. I’ve retired my IE80’s in favour of these.
customer_reviews.author: m00min

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality from these headphones is fantastic as it the quality of the product, this is my first pair of sennheiser and I'm really happy with my purchase and the great price from Tekzone UK and fast delivery with DPD. I highly recommend the Sennheiser Momentum 2.0 *****.
customer_reviews.author: andrew thomas

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely top quality headset! Sound is fantastic, easy to connect to Bluetooth devices and looks classy too. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kanika Punj

customer_reviews.title: Poor noise cancellation and poor sound quality for the person you are calling
customer_reviews.text: Good product but noise cancellation terrible. When I call my friends and family say the quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Micah and maia

customer_reviews.title: Good sounds
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and battery life, the ear plugs tend to be uncomfortable after a while.
customer_reviews.author: twizz

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless earbuds I have tried, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: By wireless standards I found the audio quality to be very good. Signal strength also impressive. Build quality very good. Unfortunately I came to realize I really dislike the neckband style, I don't find it comfortable. If this doesn't bother you I think they're a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Faulty, and not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 4 hours of service, wouldn't charge or respond. Before they stopped working, the sound wasn't noticeably different from the £30 earphones that had given me 2 good years of service. Really not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D E.

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser MOMENTUM In-Ear Wireless
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the sound quality. I recommend For better sounding base tones use the correct sized rubber ear adaptors so they fit in your ear snugly. Otherwise you’re going to be disappointed with the sound quality. I think if you try these your going to be well impressed with them
customer_reviews.author: Tim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is perfect the materials feel and look super high quality. The sound quality is great and head phones are super comfy. The battery life is great and charging time is really quick. Use them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality control, the right side has a very obvious opening in the plastic compared to the left, I can see this getting worse over time, shame as they sound really Good, not acceptable at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan H.

customer_reviews.title: Love these - never get tangled
customer_reviews.text: Love these - never get tangled, I always know where they are and they sound great. Use them for commuting on the tube, and whilst it would be nice to have the noise cancellation of an over-ear set - these are just way more practical and less bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Eld

customer_reviews.title: Sound 9/10
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable silicone buds, i will need to replace them with a pair of comply foam ones; other than that, top notch pair of wireless in ear headphones, best that i got until now.
customer_reviews.author: HardX

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: I like it and made using the phine much easeir
customer_reviews.author: maryam homoud

customer_reviews.title: Sound failed in left ear.
customer_reviews.text: The sound failed in the left ear so it’s now really faint. Pretty disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Todd

customer_reviews.title: Practical, but sounds disappointing compared to my old Bose in-ears
customer_reviews.text: Neckband makes these a winner for me, but was hoping for a richer sound from them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Best wireless in ear on the market!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best in ear wireless headphones. The comfort fit and premium sound quality is A class
customer_reviews.author: ahmed hafeez

customer_reviews.title: Best headphone
customer_reviews.text: Great headphone, 100 percent value of money. Using cor last 4 months continuously and my love on this is increasing. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashis

customer_reviews.title: Classy but not useful
customer_reviews.text: Connection stability and audio lag in videos are definitely major bugs on this hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Kunal Hatode

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good mid range wireless headphones, ideal for the daily commute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding ear phones
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable ear phones and feel really premium Pros Very comfortable and comes with ear tips that supports all ear sizes Very light and sits well with almost all outfits Clear sound with good bass Battery life is really good lasted 5 days Audio for call is clear with caller on the other line not knowing i was using headphones Cons Button layout to skip track forward is oddly placed wish earbud cable was braided all in all a great piece of kit that i can recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and so much better than wired
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a couple of weeks ago and was hooked. Great sound and so much better than wired. I'm so used to having wired I still forget I'm not attached to the device. Quite expensive but well worth the money. I looked around for a while and was going to buy Bose but glad I got these. I could never go back to wired now
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jacqueline Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sound & comfort. Poor sync
customer_reviews.text: I went for these earphones after upgrading to a headphone jack-less iPhone. I was over the moon with the quality of the wired momentums so these felt like a must buy. The quality & comfort is identical to the wired which I have to say impressed me as I was expecting a drop in quality. However, there’s a massive issue in terms of audio/video lag on these. On any app I’ve tried watching a video or playing a game, the sound comes through about a second after the video. You can imagine this makes for a frustrating video watching experience. Given the price tag, I would expect much better especially from Sennheiser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound, mediocre wireless connection
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Unfortunately the bluetooth connection is sometimes a bit slow and cumbersome, even while connecting to devices that were already paired before. Some cheaper products connect faster, I would have expected more for the steep price. The message for "power off" and "power on" are virtually indistinguishable, so when the connection is slow, it is sometimes difficult to establish whether you are switching your product on or off. Apart from connection issues, good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Lennert Onkelinx

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones i have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones i have ever purchased. The only minor downside is that they feel like their are upside down. The cables feel like they should come out of the top and not the bottom. There must be a good reason for this.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Tate

customer_reviews.title: Pure Style
customer_reviews.text: Sound is clear and crisp, good bass but I do prefer a little more volume like my LG730 provide. My only niggle is that if the earbuds are not in your ears they hang loose.
customer_reviews.author: mick

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic top-class number one Bluetooth headphones I try £500 different ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic top-class number one Bluetooth headphones I try £500 different make Bluetooth headphones but this one number one
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Shame as they are otherwise good headphones, easy to link via Bluetooth to an ...
customer_reviews.text: Alas, with the second pair of these to have failed in under a week's use, I have concluded that they are wholly incompatible with use during vigorous exercise, e.g. running on a treadmill. I suspect that perspiration gets into the small control panel and that, alas, is that - kaput. Shame as they are otherwise good headphones, easy to link via Bluetooth to an i-Phone and, despite any misgivings about having a yoke round one's neck, comfortable to wear. I'm not seeking a replacement this time.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyFranc

customer_reviews.title: It was refurbished!!! :(
customer_reviews.text: WHAT THE ****??? I bought this product as new, but when I opened the box (it was not sealed) I realised it was used!!! The earphones were DIRTY!!! PUAGH!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Contreras

customer_reviews.title: the treble is too much to the point of bothering ...
customer_reviews.text: the treble is too much to the point of bothering your ear. that's the only problem with it but that's too big of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: ashkan

product_meta.title: Sennheiser Momentum 2.0 In-Ear Wireless Bluetooth Headphones - Black
product_meta.description: Momentum sound - a powerful bass response, detailed vocal projection and a ideal sound stage is ensured by crystal-clear Bluetooth 4.1, wireless transmission, with Qualcomm apt-X compatibility for true hi-fi sound. Easy one touch pairing with smart devices is offered through NFC. The luxurious, high quality headphone is ideal for staying connected with mobile devices thanks to its 10 hour battery life, integrated three-button remote and high quality microphone for controlling music and making phone calls on the go.
feature_bullets: Delivers the signature momentum sound effortlessly: Powerful bass response, detailed vocal projection and a ideal sound stage
Free from cables, full of ideal sound. Thanks to Bluetooth 4.1, AAC codec support and Qualcomm apt-X compatibility
With a three-button remote and high-quality microphone it makes it easy to stay connected and manage phone calls and control music on the go
A snug fit is crucial for in-ear buds. Four sets of earbuds are included guaranteeing maximum wearing comfort

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
